(31564, 34486).description: Locations where weather and climate data are collected, including measurements of temperature, precipitation, and other atmospheric conditions

(31564, 34486).name: direct shortwave radiation
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The amount of solar radiation that reaches the Earth's surface directly from the sun, without being scattered by the atmosphere

(31564, 34486).name: diffuse shortwave radiation
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The amount of solar radiation that reaches the Earth's surface after being scattered by the atmosphere, coming from all directions

(31564, 34486).name: atmospheric pressure
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The force exerted by the weight of the atmosphere on the Earth's surface, typically measured in units of pressure such as millibars or pascals

(31564, 34486).name: vapor pressure
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The pressure exerted by water vapor in the air, which is a key factor in determining humidity and precipitation

(31564, 34486).name: local and remote topographic effects
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The influence of nearby and distant terrain features on the local climate and weather patterns, including effects such as shading and backscatter

(31564, 34486).name: incoming longwave radiation
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The amount of energy from the Earth's surface and atmosphere that is emitted as longwave radiation, which is an important component of the Earth's energy balance

(31564, 34486).name: clear-sky radiation
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The amount of solar radiation that reaches the Earth's surface on a clear day, without any cloud cover or atmospheric interference

(31564, 34486).name: cloud cover
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The amount of cloudiness in the sky, which can affect the amount of solar radiation that reaches the Earth's surface

(31564, 34486).name: evapotranspiration
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The process by which plants release water vapor into the air through transpiration, which is an important component of the Earth's water cycle

(31564, 34486).name: vegetation type
(31564, 34486).label: variable
(31564, 34486).description: The classification of plants and vegetation into different categories, such as grassland, evergreen, deciduous, and mixed forest

(33966, 36803).name: evapotranspiration
(33966, 36803).label: variable
(33966, 36803).description: The process by which water is transferred from the land to the atmosphere through the combined processes of evaporation and transpiration>

(33966, 36803).name: temperature
(33966, 36803).label: variable
(33966, 36803).description: A measure of the warmth or coolness of the atmosphere, often used in climate and environmental studies>

(33966, 36803).name: MODIS
(33966, 36803).label: instrument
(33966, 36803).description: The Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer, an instrument used for remote sensing of the Earth’s surface and atmosphere>

(33966, 36803).name: snow cover
(33966, 36803).label: variable
(33966, 36803).description: The extent of snow on the ground, often used as an indicator of climate and weather patterns>

(33966, 36803).name: FLUXNET
(33966, 36803).label: project
(33966, 36803).description: A network of sites that measure the exchange of carbon and water between the atmosphere and terrestrial ecosystems>

(33966, 36803).name: GPP
(33966, 36803).label: variable
(33966, 36803).description: Gross Primary Production, the total amount of carbon fixed by plants through photosynthesis>

(33966, 36803).name: LE
(33966, 36803).label: variable
(33966, 36803).description: Latent Heat, a measure of the energy transferred from the Earth's surface to the atmosphere through evaporation>

(33966, 36803).name: FLUXCOM
(33966, 36803).label: project
(33966, 36803).description: A project that provides distributed products of evapotranspiration and gross primary production>

(33966, 36803).name: vegetation type
(33966, 36803).label: variable
(33966, 36803).description: A classification of plant species and communities based on their characteristics and growth habits>

(36384, 39123).name: FLUXCOM
(36384, 39123).label: project
(36384, 39123).description: A project providing datasets of evapotranspiration and gross primary production through the upscaling of flux tower measurements>

(36384, 39123).name: TRENDY
(36384, 39123).label: project
(36384, 39123).description: A project aiming to understand the dynamics of the terrestrial carbon cycle through model intercomparisons>

(36384, 39123).name: ERA Interim
(36384, 39123).label: project
(36384, 39123).description: A reanalysis project by the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts providing global atmospheric data>

(36384, 39123).name: ET
(36384, 39123).label: variable
(36384, 39123).description: Evapotranspiration, a measure of the amount of water transferred from the land surface to the atmosphere>

(36384, 39123).name: GPP
(36384, 39123).label: variable
(36384, 39123).description: Gross Primary Production, a measure of the amount of carbon fixed by plants through photosynthesis>

(36384, 39123).name: T&C
(36384, 39123).label: model
(36384, 39123).description: A model used for simulating water fluxes, including evapotranspiration and runoff>

(36384, 39123).name: CLM4CN
(36384, 39123).label: model
(36384, 39123).description: The Community Land Model version 4 with carbon and nitrogen cycling, used for simulating land surface processes>

(36384, 39123).name: LPJ_GUESS
(36384, 39123).label: model
(36384, 39123).description: A dynamic vegetation model used for simulating the dynamics of vegetation and terrestrial carbon cycle>

(36384, 39123).name: LPJ
(36384, 39123).label: model
(36384, 39123).description: A model used for simulating land surface processes, including vegetation dynamics and hydrology>

(36384, 39123).name: OCN
(36384, 39123).label: model
(36384, 39123).description: A model used for simulating oceanic processes, including ocean carbon cycle>

(36384, 39123).name: Switzerland
(36384, 39123).label: location
(36384, 39123).description: A country located in Europe, known for its mountainous terrain and diverse climate>

(36384, 39123).name: Austria
(36384, 39123).label: location
(36384, 39123).description: A country located in Europe, known for its mountainous terrain and diverse climate>

(36384, 39123).name: Italy
(36384, 39123).label: location
(36384, 39123).description: A country located in Europe, known for its diverse climate and geography>

(36384, 39123).name: vegetation type
(36384, 39123).label: variable
(36384, 39123).description: A characteristic of the land surface, influencing processes such as evapotranspiration and runoff>

(38707, 40419).name: MODIS snow cover product
(38707, 40419).label: instrument
(38707, 40419).description: A remote sensing product used to measure snow cover, provided by the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer instrument

(38707, 40419).name: atmospheric surface layer
(38707, 40419).label: location
(38707, 40419).description: The lowest part of the atmosphere, where the atmosphere interacts with the Earth's surface

(38707, 40419).name: measured runoff
(38707, 40419).label: variable
(38707, 40419).description: The amount of water that flows over the land and into streams, measured through field observations or experiments

(38707, 40419).name: natural catchments
(38707, 40419).label: location
(38707, 40419).description: Areas of land that drain water into a common outlet, without significant human regulation or modification

(38707, 40419).name: P-ET
(38707, 40419).label: variable
(38707, 40419).description: The difference between precipitation and evapotranspiration, used as a proxy for runoff in this study

(38707, 40419).name: DEM
(38707, 40419).label: instrument
(38707, 40419).description: A digital elevation model, a digital representation of the Earth's surface topography

(38707, 40419).name: land cover product
(38707, 40419).label: instrument
(38707, 40419).description: A dataset that categorizes the different types of land cover, such as vegetation, soil, or water

(38707, 40419).name: icemelt
(38707, 40419).label: variable
(38707, 40419).description: The amount of ice that melts, contributing to runoff in glacierized catchments
